column6: I chose Plan 2. Although it is not the cheapest, I feel as though over time it will be the most economical. Wind power is incredibly green and cost effective. This plan will reduce greenhouse gases. I think that both coal and nuclear should be kept to a minimum as they pollute the environment and are more expensive.
I suggest that we try as much as possible to make sure we stay within the budget constraints. Also, a plan that will not cause as much harm to the environment.
Stina I agree with Plan 2 also
I agree with you about the budget as well.
Are we the only ones in the group? I see we only have 8 minutes to complete.
plan 2 is also lower on water pollution. I agree with Stina
Who will type in the Etherpad?
it has a low waste disposal cost as well.
